# Contributing

We are not currently operating with an open development model.

Therefore, we do not accept Pull Requests. Instead, you can contribute by reporting bugs and other issues through our Issues section.

## Issues

Please feel free to report bugs, feature requests, or questions via [Issues](https://github.com/ryuapp/normal-notepad/issues).

When reporting a bug, please provide a minimal reproduction so we can respond quickly.

## Pull Requests

We do not accept Pull Requests at this time.
